name: Marx
winningPhrases: All I do is win, win, win!
losingPhrases: How will I ever beat this guy?

name: Slippy
winningPhrases: I never doubted it for a second
losingPhrases: How can I ever show my face around here again?

name: Latree
winningPhrases: A victory is only as such if the next battle is won
The power of the mind is unparalleled
Harry Potter has nothing on me!
losingPhrases: I must return to my training...
I shall return stronger than ever!

name: J-Dog
winningPhrases: I've eaten meals bigger than that for breakfast!
losingPhrases: In my mind, I already won...
I'll never hear the end of this from Osman...

name: Osman
winningPhrases: Who knew I was that good?  Oh right, me!
losingPhrases: Maybe I need to try something else...
How can I explain this to J-Dog?
